title: Technology Integration Design Framework-Based Education Course for Preservice Science Teachers

context.prior_knowledge: Mastery of Basic Middle School Science Education Theories and Mathematics Curriculum Knowledge
context.additional_context: Program to enhance competency in designing integrated mathematics-science education using digital tools.

learning_goals: Learners write at least three technology-integrated lesson designs using the MAGDAIRE framework.
Learners develop instructional materials using at least five digital tools (AR/VR, simulations, etc.) suitable for science curricula.
Learners identify at least three areas for improvement in technology-integrated lesson designs through peer feedback and reflective evaluation.
Learners create at least two interactive visualizations of mathematical concepts.

resources: Digital Creation Tools (Canva, PPT, H5P, etc.)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
